item.title: Supreme Court takes up legality of bans on transgender athletes in women’s sports
item.description: The cases involve laws in Idaho and West Virginia that bar transgender athletes from participating in women’s and girls’ school sports.

item.title: Live updates: Republican-led House closes in on passage of Trump’s massive tax and immigration bill
item.description: Get the latest news on President Donald Trump’s second term in the White House and the Republican-led Congress.
